item.title: Our part in world violence (Tibet)
item.description: From May 11, 2008 Violence and aggression rise from fear and greed. What gives the Chinese the right to violate human rights? To kill and torture people?

item.title: LfE 7: No news is…
item.description: 12/10/2009 Hello!! It’s been a while it seems since my last update. All is well on this side of the world. I am cocooned in academic life and don’t hear the news very often.
